author: Theo Francis
title: Deceased CSX Chief Hunter Harrison Was Among Top-Paid CEOs
text:
CSX Corp. disclosed compensation totaling $151 million for its deceased Chief Executive Hunter Harrison, the largest pay package reported so far by a large U.S. company for 2017. But the railroad veteran’s payout isn’t what it seems.
About $116 million of his package -- stock options that were to vest over four years -- vanished with Mr. Harrison’s death on Dec. 16, the company said in its annual proxy statement filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission late Thursday.
...
